{"id":733702763,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1656444429,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"21 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/733702763/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"19.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n      int left =0 ;\n      int right = height.size() -1;\n      int leftmax =0 ;\n      int rightmax =0;\n      int ans =0;\n        while(left <right){\n            leftmax = max(leftmax,height[left]);\n            rightmax = max(rightmax ,height[right]);\n            if(leftmax <rightmax){\n                ans += leftmax -height[left];\n                left++;\n            }\n            else {\n                ans += rightmax - height[right];\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return ans ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
